word: NO SOONER WAS IT DECIDED BY THE CONFERENCE TO GO FORWARD WITH THE PURCHASE OF THE PLACE, THAN A PLAN WAS SUGGESTED OF SELLING OFF A PORTION OF THE ACREAGE TO HELP PAY FOR THE BALANCE. BY THOSE IMMEDIATELY CONNECTED WITH THE INSTITUTION, IT WAS FELT THAT THE FUTURE DEVELOPMENT OF THE WORK WOULD REQUIRE ALL THE LAND WE HAD AND MORE.
